img_summary: The image shows a video game interface where the player can retrieve lost spirits. The screen displays a grid with one highlighted slot labeled "Wandering Wight," featuring an image of a character. The instruction "Hold to Retrieve" is visible, indicating an action the player can take, likely by pressing the "A" button. Additionally, there is a decorative scene on the right side, featuring a small ornate pot and cherry blossom branches, suggesting an in-game environment or setting. The "B" button is shown for returning to a previous screen or menu.
